sentences.sContent: But it contained one very interesting piece of data: in 2008, for the first time in sixteen years, the finance and insurance industry shrank.
sentences.sContent_eng: But it contained one very interesting piece of data: in 2008, for the first time in sixteen years, the finance and insurance industry shrank.
sentences.sCn: 但是，这份报告里有一项非常耐人寻味的数据：在2008年，金融保险业出现近十六年来的首次萎缩。

words.tran: （与 the 连用）第六的，第六个的；六分之一的
第十六的；十六分之一的
月的第六日，（与the连用的）第六个；六分之一
